cipher_hg2589.cipher_hg2589

Module Contents

Functions

cipher(text, shift[, encrypt])

Encrypts or decrypt the text
cipher_hg2589.cipher_hg2589.cipher(text, shift, encrypt=True)

Encrypts or decrypt the text

text: str

Input string to be encrypted or decrypted.

shift: int

Integer value for shifting.

encrypt: bool

A boolean to determine if encryption is required.

returns

new_text – The encrypted or decrypted text.

rtype

str

Examples

>>> from cipher_cy2617 import cipher
>>> text = str('Ag')
>>> shift = int(1)
>>> encrypt = False
>>> cipher_cy2617.cipher('Ag', 1, False)
    'Bh'
